results.title: ABBV-712-induced cardiac pathology in rats is related to off-target-driven acute vasodilation, tachycardia, and increased cardiac contractility.
results.text_hl: ABBV-712 resulted in decreased mean arterial pressure and increased heart rate in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that was prevented by pre-dosing @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. ABBV-712-induced @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@myocardial necrosis@@@ was also prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, suggesting a mechanistic link between hemodynamic changes and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac pathology@@@.

citations.NLM: Kohnken R, Fossey S, Buck WR, Segreti J, Treadway J, Green J, Koshman YE, Zafiratos M, Mittelstadt S, Blomme E, Foley CM. ABBV-712-induced cardiac pathology in rats is related to off-target-driven acute vasodilation, tachycardia, and increased cardiac contractility. Toxicol Sci. 2025 Apr 11;():. PMID: 40214157
citations.BibTeX: @article{40214157, title={ABBV-712-induced cardiac pathology in rats is related to off-target-driven acute vasodilation, tachycardia, and increased cardiac contractility.}, author={Kohnken R and Fossey S and Buck WR and Segreti J and Treadway J and Green J and Koshman YE and Zafiratos M and Mittelstadt S and Blomme E and Foley CM}, journal={Toxicol Sci}}

results.title: Flacourtia indica fruit extract modulated antioxidant gene expression, prevented oxidative stress and ameliorated kidney dysfunction in isoprenaline administered rats
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@Inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ was also visible in kidney section of @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@ISO@@@ administered @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ which was significantly prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and Flacourtia indica fruit extract.

citations.NLM: Selim S, Akter N, Nayan SI, Chowdhury FI, Saffoon N, Khan F, Ahmed KS, Ahmed MI, Hossain MM, Alam MA. Flacourtia indica fruit extract modulated antioxidant gene expression, prevented oxidative stress and ameliorated kidney dysfunction in isoprenaline administered rats Biochem Biophys Rep. 2021 Jul;26():101012. PMID: 34041370

results.title: [Effect of the beta-adrenoblockader atenolol on the extent of myocardial necrosis in transient and permanent coronary occlusion].
results.text_hl: [Effect of the beta-adrenoblockader @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on the extent of @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@myocardial necrosis@@@ in transient and permanent @DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@].

results.title: Effect of pretreatment with atenolol and nifedipine on ZD6126-induced cardiac toxicity in rats.
results.text_hl: Pretreatment of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ ameliorated the acute hemodynamic changes and prevented @CHEMICAL_N_acetylcochinol_O_phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C455219 @@@ZD6126@@@-induced increases in both troponin T and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@myocardial necrosis@@@ but did not prevent @CHEMICAL_N_acetylcochinol_O_phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C455219 @@@ZD6126@@@-induced @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor necrosis@@@ in an @CELLLINE_CVCL:5U93 @@@Hras5@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ xenograft model in nude @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Gould S, Westwood FR, Curwen JO, Ashton SE, Roberts DW, Lovick SC, Ryan AJ. Effect of pretreatment with atenolol and nifedipine on ZD6126-induced cardiac toxicity in rats. J Natl Cancer Inst. 2007 Nov 21;99(22):1724-8. PMID: 18000220
citations.BibTeX: @article{18000220, title={Effect of pretreatment with atenolol and nifedipine on ZD6126-induced cardiac toxicity in rats.}, author={Gould S and Westwood FR and Curwen JO and Ashton SE and Roberts DW and Lovick SC and Ryan AJ}, journal={J Natl Cancer Inst}, volume={99}, number={22}, pages={1724-8}}

results.title: Atenolol offers better protection than clonidine against cardiac injury in kainic acid-induced status epilepticus.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@Clonidine@@@, however, failed to reduce the power of EEG frequencies. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ and to a lesser extent @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@clonidine@@@ attenuated the cardiac hypercontraction band @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ infiltration, and @DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ at 48 h after KA, relative to the saline-KA group.

citations.NLM: Read MI, Harrison JC, Kerr DS, Sammut IA. Atenolol offers better protection than clonidine against cardiac injury in kainic acid-induced status epilepticus. Br J Pharmacol. 2015 Oct;172(19):4626-38. PMID: 25765931
citations.BibTeX: @article{25765931, title={Atenolol offers better protection than clonidine against cardiac injury in kainic acid-induced status epilepticus.}, author={Read MI and Harrison JC and Kerr DS and Sammut IA}, journal={Br J Pharmacol}, volume={172}, number={19}, pages={4626-38}}
